email.title: Chobots Password
email.content:
Dear Chobots player,
We have been informed that you have forgotten your password to one or multiple accounts on your email address.
Here's a list of all the account's informations for you.
%1$s
If you didn't request to receive this message, somebody may be trying to steal your account(s). Please change your email password if you did not request this, along with your Chobot account password, as a person might be trying to break into them.
Thanks for playing, Chobots Team
